features: NEVER FLATTENS – give yourself superior lumbar support with our back support pillow. Designed to hold its shape even after multiple uses, it will never flatten down or thin out so you will always receive comfortable support wherever you choose to use it. The support pillow helps to improve posture and provide comfort whilst you sit and eat, drive, work, watch TV, read and so much more.

JUST THE RIGHT SUPPORT – the high-grade memory foam is perfectly firm, so you won’t find it too soft or too hard. Designed to suit most adults who require a lumbar support pillow for office chair, car or other seating option. Featuring an ergonomic curve, it sits perfectly against your back once secured in place providing you hours of comfort when you’re working or driving.

IMPROVE YOUR SITTING POSTURE – if you sit for long hours at a time in an office or drive long distances on a regular basis then you can create a more comfortable seating position by attaching our lumbar support pillow to your seat or chair. It is designed to offer support to your lower back thanks to the integrated memory foam which provides cushioning as you sit.

MULTIPURPOSE DESIGN – featuring an easy to use, adjustable strap you can use the lumbar support pillow in the workplace on your office chair, when relaxing at home, while driving your car on road trips, and on plane seats when flying. It is also great for adding to a wheelchair for more comfort and gamers love it for extra support when gaming. If you choose to use the lumbar support pillow for car journeys it will always remain in place, regardless of the terrain.

BREATHABLE EASY TO CLEAN MESH – the 3D mesh outer layer encourages air circulation throughout the pillow, you can remove this cover and machine wash it to keep your lumbar support pillow looking and smelling fresh. Make discomfort when sitting a thing of the past with our lumbar support pillow which will keep you stable, secure and cushioned when working, driving and relaxing.
body.description: Superior comfort Unlike some pillows that become flattened over time, the Samsonite lumbar support cushion will remain and never flatten thanks to the high-density memory foam structure. By attaching it to your chosen chair you are providing additional support to your lower back to help ease any discomfort. Hours spent sitting at a desk can negatively impact our posture so by using the support cushion you are creating an ergonomic experience that will provide comfort by moulding to the shape of your back. Super easy to use Measuring 13.5 inches x 14 inches x 4.5 inches, the lumbar support cushion features an integrated adjustable strap that allows an easy and secure fit to most chairs including office swivel chairs, car seats, truck seats, dining chairs, plane seats and more, and wheelchairs. The convenient slider buckle positioned on the strap can be positioned easily for you to achieve the perfect fit. It only takes a moment to set your cushion up for a more comfortable sitting experience. BUY NOW and support your lower back throughout the day with the lumbar support pillow from Samsonite

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Samsonite's Ultimate Support for your Lower Back This lumbar support pillow has been designed to help elevate comfort, particularly in your lower back, for those who sit for long periods of time at work, home office, or drive for long hours. This lumbar pillow keeps you sitting upright and secure throughout your busy day.

The Ideal Solution for an Office or your Home This lumbar support pillow can be used in a wide variety of situations. Office workers find our lumbar pillow to be an essential accessory when working at their desks or home for extended periods of time as they are less inclined to slump in their chair.

Ultimate Lumbar Support for your Car Excellent for long car journeys or those who drive long distance on a daily basis such as truck and taxi drivers or sales representatives, this lumbar pillow will help you to arrive at your destination feeling comfortable and refreshed.

Samsonite's High-Grade Memory Foam Each of our lumbar support pillows are made from high grade memory foam which naturally helps to mold your body to the pillow. Comfortable to use, yet firm enough to provide ultimate support, our lumbar pillow is designed to be durable and long lasting for multiple years’ worth of use. This back pillow also features a mesh, breathable outer layer to keep air circulating throughout the pillow.

Ergonomic Shape Designed to Elevate Comfort This lumbar pillow complements your backs natural arches to elevate comfort while sitting for extended periods of time.This contoured shape of our lumbar pillow will gently help guide your lower back and spine to mold to the lumbar pillow for a secure and comfortable hold that provides maximum comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceeded my expectations!
reviews.reviewText: This support worked so well in my recliner that I ordered one for my truck. I have back issues and this cushion provides outstanding support. It is just the right size and shape to fit the area easily. The price is also a bargain. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Supportive but soft
reviews.reviewText: I have awful back pain so this pillow is the perfect mix of soft and supportive for car rides.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable, Not firm, Does not fit 2023 Corolla
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this product for my 2023 Corolla. The product listing states that it fits cars universally. The straps on the back of the pillow are elastic, but do not extend far enough to strap to the Corolla's front seats. Despite this, just laying the pillow in the lumbar area seems to work pretty well.This pillow is NOT firm. It is very plush. It becomes even more plush when it's hot out and your car warms up. If you are looking for very solid support - look elsewhere. If you are like me and prefer something more plush, then proceed. This pillow succeeded in eliminating back pain I was experiencing during long car rides in my bucket seats. It reinforced good posture in me and filled the gap that was causing me pain.Note: I have seen other reviewers complaining about the pillow while uploading pictures of the pillow being attached in the wrong orientation.UPDATE: This pillow essentially becomes a rock during winter when it's left out in the cold. Not sure if this problem exists in other pillows, though I suspect it may just be a material property of most memory foams? The pillow becomes softer again after it warms up from you sitting on it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Helps some with my back. Good quality. Got delivered fast. Good experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great support for mid and lower back while sitting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Possibly used and does not fit some chairs properly
reviews.reviewText: I bought this new but received what looks like a possibly used item. As other reviewers have stated, there appears to be small black hairs on the inside if you unzip it. Now, to be fair I'm unsure if it's actually human hair or simply remnants of the manufacturing process. It's possible they could be from the outer casing as they do match the black color. No way to tell for sure, but it was certainly off-putting. Also, this back pillow will not fit securely all chairs, or at least it didn't with mine. It's fine when using it, I'm only talking about when not in use, i don't like how it is loosely secured. To explain, my office chair has a mild curve to the back of it. Problem is, this back pillow lines up with the apex of the curved chair back, and since this only has one strap on the middle of it it ends up just kind of loosely sitting there with a big gap a the top where it doesn't make contact with the back of the chair. Not a big deal and does not affect it's usefulness, but i still don't like it. The solution to this is to have 2 straps to secure it, one on the top and one on the bottom. Other similar back pillows sold here do have that, so i bought one of those instead, and it did solve that issue. Other than those 2 problems, this is a good or at least an ok back pillow. It does provide some support, though it is memory foam so it will definitely flatten somewhat (by around half it's thickness) if you use if for more than half an hour or so. It also does not have good ventilation (memory foam never does) but that is not an issue if you're in a cool place with air conditioning. The only other option i know of would to get the "mesh" version of these lumbar support products. In any case, this is an good and alright product. It's a back pillow so hey, there's not much you can say about it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Supportive and comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars works well if your chair allows it
reviews.reviewText: It is a nicely fabricated, low weight back support cushion. It works great on our sofas and in our car. It does not work with the small business chair that is used in the office where the cushion pushes the user forward off the seat. The seats that it works with are better than 20 inches deep, the one that it doesn't work with is 19 inches or less deep.

Me llego un día antes de lo planeado, lo recomiendo ya que desde que lo sacas de la bolsa se siente lo cómodo q es, así como la calidad del material, cuenta con su cierre para facilitar el lavado y el relleno es bueno, pues, no es como de una almohada cualquiera.
Comfortable support for a smaller desk chair. Fits well along the lower back without being bulky.
Quality all round, firm and comfortable.I can sit comfortably on my chair for long periods with this lumbar support without feeling strain
Ideal para el trabajo apoyo en jornadas diarias de oficina.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I completely regret buyig this. It is not comfortable and doesn't help me to relieve my back pain at all. Such a waste of money.Don't get tempted by Samsonite. It's just a piece of foam made in China. It keeps falling down as the strap is so loose. It is definitely not worth buying this.
